title: Cauliflower Mac 'N' Cheese
method: Grease a medium baking/small casserole dish
Boil a pan of salted water, add Cauliflower and cook for about 5 mins
Whilst the Caluiflower is cooking, in another pan, melt the butter on a medium high heat
Once melted, whisk in the flour until a thick paste forms
Gradually add in the milk, until mixture is thick (add a little more flour if it gets too runny)
Remove from heat and immediately whisk in cheese, yeast, and egg yolks
Add Cauliflower and fold until evenly coated
If not GF, sprinkle breadcrumbs on top
Bake until cheese is bubbling - 30 mins ish
